amendment.description: Amendment requires the Chair of the Federal Reserve to submit a report on the level of implementation of this bill every 90 days until the Chair can report full industry implementation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-92 to require the Chair of the Federal Reserve to submit a report on the level of implementation of this bill every 90 days until the Chair can report full industry implementation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
